entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 37 %
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
